00018   SP38PGSimulator::SP38PGSimulator(ScenarioReader* sr,int sd,string host,RewardType tp,bool fapc,bool f,bool d, bool n,int maxt,bool dp)
00019     : reward_type(tp), run_forever(f), debug(d), noisy(n)
00020   {
00021     sim = new SP38Simulation(sd,sr,host,fapc,run_forever,debug,noisy,maxt,dp);
00022     scenario = sim->getScenario();
00023     sim->startSimulation();
00024   }

00031   void SP38PGSimulator::getReward(libpg::Vector& rewards){
00032     int pos = 0;
00033     // For every intersection
00034     for(IntersectionSet::iterator ii = scenario->intersections.begin(); ii != scenario->intersections.end(); ii++,pos++){
00035       // Sum the detectors count in the last step
00036       int total=0;
00037       switch(reward_type){
00038         
00039       case RT_LocalReward:
00040         total = getLocalReward(*ii);
00041         break;
00042         
00043       case RT_MixedReward:
00044         total = getMixedReward(*ii);
00045         break;
00046 
00047       case RT_PowerLocalReward:
00048         total = 100*getLocalReward(*ii);
00049         break;
00050 
00051       default:
00052         cout << "ERROR: Unknown reward type chosen: " << reward_type << endl;
00053         exit(-1);
00054       };
00055       
00056       // The throughput is the reward
00057       assert(total >= 0);
00058       rewards(pos) = total;
00059     }
00060   }
00061 
00066   int SP38PGSimulator::getLocalReward(Intersection* i){
00067     int total = 0;
00068     int time_step_size = sim->getTimeStepSize();
00069     for(DetectorSet::iterator d = i->detectors.begin(); d != i->detectors.end(); d++){
00070       total += sim->getDetectorCountBetween(i, *d, sim->getCurrentTime()-time_step_size, sim->getCurrentTime());
00071     } 
00072     return total;
00073   }
00074 
00082   int SP38PGSimulator::getMixedReward(Intersection* i){
00083     int all_total = 0;
00084     for(IntersectionSet::iterator ii = scenario->intersections.begin(); ii != scenario->intersections.end(); ii++)
00085       all_total += getLocalReward(*ii);
00086     all_total /= scenario->intersections.size();
00087 
00088     int neigh_total = 0;
00089     for(IntersectionSet::iterator ii = i->neighbours.begin(); ii != i->neighbours.end(); ii++)
00090       neigh_total += getLocalReward(*ii);    
00091     if(i->neighbours.size() > 0) neigh_total /= i->neighbours.size();
00092     
00093     int this_total = getLocalReward(i);       
00094 
00095     return this_total*100 + neigh_total*10 + all_total;
00096   }

00103   void SP38PGSimulator::getObservation(libpg::Observation& obs){
00104     int col = 0;
00105     int max_phases = scenario->getMaxTotalPhases();
00106     int max_detectors = scenario->getMaxTotalDetectors();
00107     int time_step_size = sim->getTimeStepSize();
00108     int obs_learner = obs.getFeatures().size1();
00109     int cycle_duration =  scenario->getCycleDuration();
00110 
00111     if(debug) cout << " [Features] " <<  obs_learner << endl;
00112 
00113     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = scenario->intersections.begin(); i != scenario->intersections.end(); i++,col++){
00114 
00115       if(debug) cout << "Intersection " << col << endl;
00116 
00117       // Initializing the features
00118       for(int j = 0; j < obs_learner; j++) {
00119         obs.getFeatures()(j, col) = 0; 
00120       }
00121 
00122       int next_entry = 0;
00123 
00124       if( isUsingConstantFeature() ){
00125         // ** 0 - Constant feature
00126         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = 1; // 1 bit for constant 1 input 
00127       }
00128       
00129       if( isUsingCurrentPhaseFeature() ) {      
00130         // ** 1 - Current Phase Feature
00131         int phase_index = (*i)->getPhaseIndex(sim->getCurrentPhase(*i));
00132         if(debug) cout << "\tPhase index " << phase_index << endl;
00133         assert(phase_index >= 0 && phase_index < max_phases);
00134         obs.getFeatures()(phase_index + 1, col) = 1; // 4 bits for current phase
00135         next_entry += max_phases;
00136       }
00137 
00138       if( isUsingPhaseDurationFeature() ) {
00139         // ** 2 - Phase Duration Feature
00140         // 5 bits for duration of current phase, goes from 1 to 13
00141         int duration =  sim->getCurrentPhaseDuration(*i) / time_step_size;
00142         if(debug) cout << "\tPhase duration " << duration << endl;
00143         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 1);
00144         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 2);
00145         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 4);
00146         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 5);
00147         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 13);          
00148       }
00149 
00150       if( isUsingCycleDurationFeature() ) {
00151         // ** 3 - cycle duration feature
00152         int ccd = sim->getCurrentCycleDuration() / time_step_size;
00153         if(debug) cout << "\tCycle duration " << ccd << endl;
00154         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry+ccd, col) = 1;
00155         next_entry += cycle_duration / time_step_size;
00156       }
00157 
00158       if( isUsingAllPhasesDurationFeature() ){      
00159         // ** 4 - All Phases durations in current cycle feature
00160         for(PhaseSet::iterator p = (*i)->phases.begin(); p != (*i)->phases.end(); p++){
00161           int duration =  sim->getPhaseDurationInCurrentCycle(*i, *p) / time_step_size; 
00162           
00163           if(debug) cout << "\tPhase " << (*p)->getId() << " duration " << duration << endl;
00164           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 1);
00165           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 2);
00166           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 4);
00167           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 5);
00168           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (duration >= 13);                
00169         }
00170       
00171         // For intersections with different number of phases
00172         int phases = (*i)->getTotalPhases();
00173         if( phases < max_phases)
00174           next_entry += (max_phases - phases)*5;
00175       }
00176 
00177       if( isUsingDetectorActiveFeature() ) {
00178         // ** 5 - Detector Active feature                  
00179         for(DetectorSet::iterator d = (*i)->detectors.begin(); d != (*i)->detectors.end(); d++){
00180           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = sim->isDetectorActive(*i,*d);          
00181           if(debug) cout << "\tDetector " << (*d)->getScatsId() << " " << (sim->isDetectorActive(*i,*d)?"active":"deactive") << endl;
00182         }
00183       
00184         int detectors = (*i)->getTotalDetectors();
00185         if( detectors < max_detectors)
00186           next_entry += (max_detectors - detectors);
00187       }
00188 
00189       if( isUsingPhasesHistoryFeature() ) {
00190         //  ** 6 - Phases history
00191         for(PhaseSet::iterator p = (*i)->phases.begin(); p != (*i)->phases.end(); p++){
00192           double last_throughput = sim->getPhaseThroughputInLastCompletedCyle(*i, *p);
00193           double throughput =  sim->getPhaseThroughputInCurrentCyle(*i, *p); 
00194           if(throughput == 0.0){
00195             if(debug) cout << "\tCurrent Phase throughput equals 0, using last completed cycle throughput" << endl;
00196             throughput = last_throughput;
00197           }
00198           double max_throughput =  sim->getIntersectionMaxThroughput(*i); 
00199           if(debug) cout << "\tPhase " << (*p)->getId() << " throughput " << throughput << " max " << max_throughput << endl;
00200           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (throughput > max_throughput*0.01);
00201           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (throughput > max_throughput*0.25);
00202           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (throughput > max_throughput*0.50);
00203           obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = (throughput > max_throughput*0.75);
00204         }
00205         int phases = (*i)->getTotalPhases();    
00206         if( phases < max_phases)
00207           next_entry += (max_phases - phases)*4;        
00208       }
00209 
00210       if( isUsingIgnoredFeature() ) {
00211         // ** 7 - Am I being ignored by the Simulator to satisfy constraints? :-(
00212         bool ignored = sim->isAnythingScheduled(*i,sim->getCurrentTime());
00213         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry++, col) = ignored;
00214         if(debug) cout << ( ignored ? "\tAction will be IGNORED" : "\tAction will be issued" ) << endl;
00215       }
00216 
00217       if( isUsingDayHourFeature() ) {      
00218         // ** 8 - Hour of the day
00219         int hod = sim->getDayHour();
00220         int mhod = sim->getDayHourMinute();
00221         if(debug) cout << "\tHour of the day " << hod << ":" << mhod << endl;
00222         obs.getFeatures()(next_entry+hod, col) = 1;
00223         next_entry += 24;       
00224       }
00225 
00226       if(debug) cout << endl;
00227 
00228       // Some checkings
00229       assert(next_entry == obs_learner);
00230       for(int i=0; i <obs_learner; i++)
00231         assert( obs.getFeatures()(i,col) == 0 || obs.getFeatures()(i,col) == 1);
00232     }
00233     if(debug) cout << endl;
00234     
00235   }

00241   int SP38PGSimulator::getObsRows(){
00242     int max_phases = scenario->getMaxTotalPhases();
00243     int max_detectors = scenario->getMaxTotalDetectors();    
00244     int cycle_duration = scenario->getCycleDuration();
00245     int time_step_size = sim->getTimeStepSize();
00246     int total = 0;
00247     
00248     if( isUsingConstantFeature() )
00249       total ++;                                 // ** 0 - Constant feature
00250     if( isUsingCurrentPhaseFeature() )
00251       total += max_phases;                      // ** 1 - Current phase
00252     if( isUsingPhaseDurationFeature() )
00253       total += 5;                               // ** 2 - Phase duration
00254     if( isUsingCycleDurationFeature() )
00255       total += cycle_duration / time_step_size; // ** 3 - cycle duration
00256     if( isUsingAllPhasesDurationFeature() )
00257       total += 5*max_phases;                    // ** 4 - All phases durations
00258     if( isUsingDetectorActiveFeature() )
00259       total += max_detectors;                   // ** 5 - Detector Active
00260     if( isUsingPhasesHistoryFeature() )
00261       total += 4*max_phases;                    // ** 6 - Phases History
00262     if( isUsingIgnoredFeature() )
00263       total ++;                                 // ** 7 - Ignorance bit
00264     if( isUsingDayHourFeature() )
00265       total += 24;                              // ** 8 - Hour of the day
00266     return total;
00267   }
00268 
00273   int SP38PGSimulator::doAction(libpg::Vector& action){
00274     int col=0;
00275     for(IntersectionSet::iterator i = scenario->intersections.begin(); i != scenario->intersections.end(); i++,col++){
00276       if(debug) cout << " Action -> Intersection " << (*i)->getScatsId() << " Phase " << (int)action[col] << endl;
00277       sim->setNewPhase(*i, (*i)->getPhaseByIndex((int)action[col]));
00278     }
00279     sim->doStep();
00280     if(!sim->simulating()){
00281       return 1;
00282     }
00283     return 0;
00284   }
